document_title: Laryngeal cancer: Causes, symptoms and diagnosis
subsection_content:
Illustration of laryngeal cancer
Laryngeal cancer is a malignant tumor originating from the laryngeal epithelium (consists of three layers). This is a type of cancer of the upper respiratory tract. In its advanced stages, cancer can invade surrounding areas and spread to other areas of the body.(1)
In Vietnam, more and more types of pure laryngeal cancer are encountered rather than hypopharyngeal cancer. People with the disease are mainly men, accounting for 96.9%, concentrated in the age group of 45 - 65.
